text:
@SenBobCasey Many #Americans have been trying to raise awareness about this #CoronaOutbreak #coronavirus #COVIDー19 since January. #Democrats were too fkn focussed on taking down our president. This tunnel vision mentality has FKD us! You folks are PATHETIC!!!
